185483004.review: I haven't played this game for long, but It's already amazing. The soundtrack, art style, game play , etc is amazing. So glad they made a multiplayer game with this art style. It's beautiful. Worth the money.

185434817.review:
I really wanted to love this game as I love this studio , but my first impression is disappointment and confusion :

-Overall, this game is about walking around ,collecting ressources. no danger or survival constraint, so it can be indeed, quite relaxing . If this is your thing, give it a try, you might enjoy it! But there is nothing much more.. to me ,it looked more like a prototype or an unfinished game project, boring because of the lack of guidance or any real purpose in the exploration.

-avatar choice is very restricted : I guess you'll have to collect enough points to be able to unlock different options or skins  or already played the other games 

- I walked 20-30 min without any purpose before finally finding the first ressource to collect and gain a few points.  moving was very slow, and it seemed like an eternity ... I never found any of the ressources to collect for the basic daily quests and felt even more frustrated.
- randomly met a few other players, you can communicate with them through a few icons like in BoT ,but looks like there is no coop options . it just adds some life to this empty environment ...

I may give it another try after a few updates , but so far I'm not convinced

185406030.review: genuinely cannot express it properly but this game is so precious to me and the art is so beautiful. it also still has an active community which is awesome so in short. play this.

185350888.review: 根本玩不了啊，开了加速器点进区以后就一直在黑屏，怎么都进入不了游戏

185297720.review: if this isn't art then idk what is

185292622.review:
Зашла поиграть за лису и вспомнить старые времена. В заснеженном биоме меня нашёл небольшой зверёк, который затем оказался слонёнком (таинство превращения опустим). Мы очень долго бегали вдвоём и это было так весело. Исследовали леса, пустоши, горы и пещеры. Потом наша стая постепенно разрослась сначала до 4х человек, затем до 6х. Из-за дурацкого обелиска нам пришлось ненадолго расстаться и о чудо, нас какое-то время бегало вместе больше 10!

Я в полнейшем восторге, что кроме меня сегодня в игре было так много людей. Я очень давно заходила сюда в последний раз и была приятно удивлена новыми обновлениями.

Хотелось бы, чтобы проект ещё жил и жил, продолжая радовать как новых игроков, так и преданных поклонников 💔

185242401.review:
[i]Meadow distinguishes itself from typical single-player shelter games by offering a cooperative online experience, where collaboration rather than individual survival is key. Players work together to collect shards and plants, unlocking a variety of rewards like new emotes, skins, and animals. Unlike many multiplayer games that rely on text or voice chat, Meadow uses only emotes for communication, fostering a subtle, non-verbal form of social interaction. (Outside of your animals vocalization) This unique feature creates a peaceful and community-driven atmosphere reminiscent of The Endless Forest, where players can connect without words.  

[u]Collectibles[/u]

At the start, you have a basic set of emotes and must cooperate to gather pink shards, which unlock new emotes. Blue shards unlock skins, and yellow shards unlock animals, adding more layers to the teamwork-driven progression. One of the game's key dynamics revolves around breaking open obelisks and monoliths, which require specific animals or a certain number of animals to open. This encourages players to strategize and work together, making collaboration essential for accessing these valuable resources. The community itself is friendly and dedicated to helping newcomers find shard and plant locations or guide them to obelisks and monoliths. 

[u]Atmosphere / Player Count[/u]

The atmosphere in Meadow is tranquil, with everything in the game designed to promote relaxation, from the soothing soundtrack to the lush, diverse environments. You can interact with the world by eating fruits, rolling in mud, or exploring biomes ranging from snowy landscapes to swamps and dense forests. The central tree acts as the starting hub where players gather, setting the stage for their journey. However, while the game’s relaxed pace is part of its charm, the player count can sometimes be low often just one or five players online at a time. This can be frustrating if you're trying to crack open obelisks or monoliths, as it requires a sufficient number of animals to do so. On the upside, shards can still be collected independently of the obelisks or monoliths, offering some reward even during quieter times.

[u]Animals[/u]

Here's the list of the playable animals in game. Let's begin with the starting animal.

Badger Cub - 

Animals unlocked through collecting the yellow shards.

Frog -

Rabbit -

Pheasant -

Fox -

Goat -

Hedgehog -

[u]Exclusive Animals[/u]

Certain animals are only obtainable through owning specific shelter products. Here’s how to unlock them.

Adult Badger -

Unlock by owning Shelter 1.

Adult Lynx -

Unlock by owning Shelter 2.

Lynx Cub -

Unlock by owning Paws.

Bear Cub -

Unlock by owning Shelter 1, Shelter 2, and Paws.

Elephant Calf -

 Unlock by owning Shelter 3.

Wolf -

Unlock by owning Symbols Meadow comic book.

Eagle -

Unlock by owning Shelter 1, Shelter 2, plus Comics and Soundtracks. Everything Shelter. [strike](I'm uncertain about Shelter 3)[/strike] 

There are additional exclusives that can only be obtained through owning the comics, such as special emotes or skins. There are also skin packs available that provide some cool new looks.

[u]In Conclusion[/u]

Meadow is a unique, relaxing multiplayer experience that emphasizes cooperation, exploration, and community. While its smaller player base can occasionally pose challenges, particularly for group-based activities, its calm pace, beautiful world, and non-competitive nature make it a standout for players seeking a peaceful, collaborative gaming experience. If you’re someone who enjoys a tranquil, social atmosphere and don’t mind a quieter player base, Meadow offers a refreshing and memorable escape. Having experienced it during its peak, I can confidently say it’s a solid, worthwhile game.

184959112.review: The best game I've ever played

184697833.review:
数年前まで何故かサーバーに接続できない不具合に悩まされ何年も休止していたのですが、こちらの日本語ガイドを参考にし解決でき再開できた事に本当に感謝します。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3293584583

独特のゲーム性、独特のグラフィックゆえ好みが分かれるゲームです。
しかしMeadowにしかない景観や一緒に誰かと遊ぶ魅力と面白さがあり、癒やされる要素が多いのもまた事実です。

Meadowならではの世界観を色んな動物になりきって各地を散策し景色を楽しんだり、
お花や食べ物やお宝みたいに見えるピースを集め追加要素を増やしたりポイントを稼いだり、
たまたま出会った他の誰かと一緒に歩き回りながら色んな時間の過ごし方を探してみるのもいいかもしれません。

個人的にはMeadowの要素の1つであるエモートや感情表現でしか表せれないコミュニケーションも魅力的に感じます。
所謂チャットやボイスチャット等は無く、予め用意されたアイコンをやり繰りし相手さんに自分の思いを伝えられるかのドキドキ感と伝わった時の嬉しさがたまらないです。

183720831.review:
サーバー入れました。
検索して調べると、PC側でDNSサーバーをGoogleのに変更すると入れると記述してある人もいますが、私の場合は別のDNSを使用しております。

ゲーム部分↓
動物でゆるく放浪したいなとセールで購入しました。雰囲気は好きな感じです！ゲームキューブの動物番長が好きなので、こういう雰囲気は好きです。
操作性に関してですがSteam入力でパッドを使用したところ、移動方向入力がとてもやりにくい。十字キーを割り当ててもこれはキツイ。
他は大丈夫でしたが、キーマウでやることにしました。移動やカメラをマウス側にほぼ割り当てました。しかしそれでも昔のMMOでももう少し操作しやすかったよな？というくらいのもので…。まぁこの話はこれくらいで。できれば改善して欲しいところだなぁ。

とにかく雰囲気が好きなら動物放浪シミュレーターとしては楽しめるかなと思います🐗

183675959.review:
Невероятно зашла. 
Проста в своей концепции - бегаешь с другими игроками, собираешь штуки, наслаждаешься умиротворением, музыкой и цветастыми стилизованными пейзажами.
Жизнь хороша.

183567660.review:
Very cute and artisitcally appealing; there's barely a game here though. The only gameplay seems to be collecting random items on the open world and interacting with other players without text/voice chat. There's no NPCs of any kind or any form of survival mechanics to worry about. Very clearly this is supposed to be a chill hang out game where you socialise via a really niche interest of role-playing as real world animals to other role-playing strangers. Even though that doesn't appeal to me; the game seems to soley rely on this and it didn't seem like many people were online to begin with.

For someone who was looking for a bit more of a wild life survival type of game; this definitely came across as just a mere prototype for an MMO idea to be honest. Which is really weird because this is a Shelter spin-off; so it should've probably at least have had more than just socialising? I have no idea why there's nothing else.

Probably just go play Shelter instead.
